message:
FYR

http://www.freeourdata.org.uk/
看到沒，似此相識的言論
英國政府單位當時的說辭，怎麼跟現今臺灣政府的說辭沒差多少。
即使像是故宮有自籌部分經費，但仍有部分來自政府預算
看來之後的論述，需解析這些機關的資金來源
story: 陳瑞霖 shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: Even though OS and the UK Hydrographic Office are designated as trading funds (which means that they operate as self-contained commercial entities receiving no direct tax funding), substantial parts of their income - up to 50% in the case of OS - comes from the public sector; meaning, in effect, the...
name: Free Our Data: Make taxpayers' data available to them
caption: freeourdata.org.uk
